text: Itte yaru ga ī. `Arrā wa kore o kinji rareta to shōgen dekiru, anata gata no shōnin o tsurete ki nasai.' Tatoe kare-ra ga shōgen shite mo, anata wa kare-ra to issho ni shōgen shite wa naranai. Mata waga shirushi o itsuwaridearu to suru mono no, munashī yōbō ni shitagatte wa naranai. Kare-ra wa raise o shinjinaide, mata kare-ra no omo ni dōi no mono o haisuru mono tachidearu
